hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd target
cat /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/standalone.xml | grep client_secret | cut -d '=' -f 3 | sed 's/[\"/\>]//g' > secret.txt
export application_uuid=deadbeef-e9b1-4585-9453-6ed31d456752 export application_id=`echo 0x$application_uuid | sed 's/-//g'`
# This UUID is currently a magic number of sorts, this will need to be parameterized to make this job portable export new_token_introspection_token=`java -jar generateJwt.jar secret.txt sub "PSAMA_APPLICATION|${application_uuid}" 365 day | grep -v "Generating"`
export old_token_introspection_token=`cat /usr/local/docker-config/jupyterhub_config.py | grep psama_token_introspection_token | cut -d '=' -f 2 | sed 's/[\"]//'g`
sed -i "s/$old_token_introspection_token/$new_token_introspection_token/g" /usr/local/docker-config/jupyterhub_config.py
docker run -i --rm -v /root/.my.cnf:/root/.my.cnf --network=host mariadb:10.8.3 mysql -h 127.0.0.1 -e \ "update application set token='$new_token_introspection_token' where uuid=$application_id;" auth
